block.p: ARONOWITZ-Sam. On June 16, 2000. Beloved and loving husband of the late Evelyn; adored father of Carole and Richard Simon, and Ellin and Ron Delsener; much loved ''Poppa Sam'' to Freddy, Lisa and Samantha, and greatgrandchildren Alexandra, Erica, Matthew, Dana and Lilly. A sweet and gentle man who will forever live in our hearts. Services private. In lieu of flowers please send contributions to the charity of your choice.
